sentences.en: Do not hesitate to laugh at anything you find amusing.
sentences.cn: 只要觉得好笑就尽管笑。

sentences.en: Don't hesitate to make comments or suggestions if you have any.
sentences.cn: 有意见尽管提好了.

sentences.en: Embarrassment caused me to hesitate.
sentences.cn: 窘迫使得我(讲话)吞吞吐吐.

sentences.en: How could we hesitate to press forward in the face of difficulties?
sentences.cn: 在困难面前怎能畏缩不前 呢 ?

sentences.en: I choose rather to hesitate my opinion than to assert it roundly.
sentences.cn: 我宁可犹疑地表示我的意见而不愿直率地断言这件事.

sentences.en: I hesitate in this work.
sentences.cn: 我在这个作品中有所犹豫。

sentences.en: I hesitate to describe him as really clever.
sentences.cn: 我不愿说他真的聪明.

sentences.en: I hesitate.
sentences.cn: 我犹豫。

sentences.en: I will not hesitate to take unpopular decisions.
sentences.cn: 我会毫不犹豫地作出并不受欢迎的决定。

sentences.en: If you get in trouble, don't hesitate to ask for advice.
sentences.cn: 如果碰到麻烦, 要赶紧向人求教.

sentences.en: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask.
sentences.cn: 有什么问题只管问.

sentences.en: If you hesitate too long, you will miss the opportunity.
sentences.cn: 如果你老是犹豫不决, 那就会错失良机.

sentences.en: In case you need something, please don't hesitate to ask me.
sentences.cn: 如果你需要什么东西, 请不客气地对我说.

sentences.en: She didn't hesitate to tell intrusive photographers to "naff off".
sentences.cn: 她毫不客气地叫那些烦人的摄影者“滚开”。

sentences.en: She hesitated before replying.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫了一下才回答。

sentences.en: So if someone asks you out, never hesitate.
sentences.cn: 如果有人叫你出去玩，千万别犹豫！

sentences.en: Some parents hesitate to take these steps because they suspect that their child is exaggerating.
sentences.cn: 一些家长迟迟不肯采取这些措施，因为他们怀疑自己的孩子在夸大其词。

sentences.en: The army did not hesitate ; they took the town by storm.
sentences.cn: 军队未迟疑, 他们突袭占领了该城.

sentences.en: The telephone rang. Catherine hesitated, debating whether to answer it.
sentences.cn: 电话响了。凯瑟琳迟疑着，考虑是否接听。

sentences.en: They don't hesitate to open fire when confronted by police.
sentences.cn: 他们遭遇警察时毫不犹豫地开火。

sentences.en: They hesitate between fighting and submitting.
sentences.cn: 他们不能决定是战还是降.

sentences.en: Yet, this is where so many of us get stuck. We hesitate; we step back from obedience in order to speculate what we should do next -- even though Jesus has already told us what we must do.
sentences.cn: 然而，我们很多人往往在这里停滞不前，我们犹豫不决；即使主耶稣已经告诉我们当作的事，我们仍然往后退步，不顺服主，还说是为了看清楚下一步该怎么做。

words.tran_cn: 迟疑的；踌躇的；犹豫不定的
踌躇，犹豫；有疑虑，不愿意

trans.tran_en: to be slow to speak or act because you feel uncertain or nervous

trans.tran_cn: 犹豫， 踌躇； 含糊； 不情愿
